Meanwhile, the President of RCA has plenty of other
decisions to make from day to day. Mr. Burns was asked, for example,
whether he found any major differences between his former job as
management consultant and his present post as corporation president.
nAs a consultant I was in the position of recommending
policies and procedures to someone else," he said. “Now I have to
